text:
Hello Folks,
The first global sync conference is coming to SF *on November 12*.

:earth_americas: Get your early bird tickets today: <https://syncconf.dev/>

For folks not tracking the movement, sync-based technologies are why Superhuman, Figma, Notion, and Linear stand above other products.
Lately, we are seeing sync emerge as the natural pattern for Human & AI collaboration. Sync systems turn complicated challenges like token streaming, long-running tasks, and resumable milestones into simple reactive primitives.

The future of app development is here!
-Enjoy!
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/yonz/|Yonatan Feleke>

attachments.fallback: Sync Conf | Nov 12, 2025 in San Francisco.
attachments.text: Sync Conf is a boutique conference on the future of real-time, collaborative, agentic software development. Happening Nov 12, 2025 in San Francisco.
attachments.title: Sync Conf | Nov 12, 2025 in San Francisco.

attachments.text: Experience: <http://Vella.ai|Vella.ai> · Education: Harvard Business School · Location: San Francisco · 500+ connections on LinkedIn. View Yonatan F.’s profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.
attachments.title: Yonatan F. - Vella.ai | LinkedIn
